fu.keys

Class LSIClassCentreDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • fu.keys.LSIClassCentreDB

  • public class LSIClassCentreDB
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the 'smaller' variant of LSIClassCentre. The entries are read from a deproDB, thus even older deproDBs with other number can be processed. In contrast to LSIClassCentre, this class statically only allocates the most important information about LSIClasses, i.e.
    • LSIClass number
    • LSIClass number end range
    • class token
    • class description
    Developer should use this class and not LSIClassCentre, if LSIClassDefs have changed meanwhile, but older versions of the database should be processed.

    • Method Detail

      • initFromDB

        public static void initFromDB(java.lang.String dbParams)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method has to be called with a connection to a deproDB, before any mapping is executed. It can be called multiple time, but only the first time actually fetches the database entries.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • initFromDB

        public static void initFromDB(java.sql.Connection connection)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method has to be called with a connection to a deproDB, before any mapping is executed. It can be called multiple time, but only the first time actually fetches the database entries.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • lsiClassRange

        public static int[] lsiClassRange(java.lang.String classToken)
        Returns the LSIClass range of an LSIClass, defined by a token. The range is an int[] with two entries 0: lsiClass (from), 1: lsiClassEndRange Returns null, if the class token is unknown.

      • allClasses

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> allClasses()
        Returns the lsiClass IDs of all classes in the database.

      • lsiClass

        public static int lsiClass(java.lang.String classToken)
        Returns the LSIclass (from) of an LSIClass, defined by a token. Throws an exception, if the token is unknown.

      • lsiClassEndRange

        public static int lsiClassEndRange(java.lang.String classToken)
        Returns the LSIclassEndRange of an LSIClass, defined by a token. Throws an exception, if the token is unknown.

      • lsiClassLevel

        public static int lsiClassLevel(java.lang.String classToken)
        Returns the Level of an LSIClass, defined by a token. Throws an exception, if the token is unknown.

      • upperClass

        public static int upperClass(java.lang.String classToken)
        Returns the upper of an LSIClass, defined by a token. Throws an exception, if the token is unknown. 0 means: no upper class found

      • lsiClassEndRange

        public static int lsiClassEndRange(int lsiClass)
        Returns the LSIclassEndRange of an LSIClass, defined by the lsiClass ID. Throws an exception, if the token is unknown.

      • lsiClassLevel

        public static int lsiClassLevel(int lsiClass)
        Returns the Level of an LSIClass, defined by the lsiClass ID. Throws an exception, if the token is unknown.

      • upperClass

        public static int upperClass(int lsiClass)
        Returns the upper of an LSIClass, defined by the lsiClass ID. Throws an exception, if the token is unknown. 0 means: no upper class found

      • subClasses

        public static int[] subClasses(int lsiClass)
        Returns all subclasses of an LSIClass, defined by the lsiClass ID.

      • classStrings

        public static java.lang.String[] classStrings(int lsiClass)
        Returns the LSI Strings of an LSIClass, defined by its class number. The result String[] has two entries 0: token, 1: class name. Returns null, if the class number is unknown.

      • classToken

        public static java.lang.String classToken(int lsiClass)
        Returns the LSI class token of an LSIClass, defined by its class number. Throws an exception, if the class number is unknown.

      • className

        public static java.lang.String className(int lsiClass)
        Returns the LSI class name of an LSIClass, defined by its class number. Throws an exception, if the class number is unknown.

      • dumpClassTree

        public static void dumpClassTree()
